Para los novatos le tengo un par de consejos que les seran utiles 
1ª Si juegan solos el dia es perfecto para ser survivor y de noche killer (Si juegan de otra forma va a tomar mucho tiempo el encontrar partida debido a los pre made 
2ª Divirtete y como vayas aprendiendo del juego y si es de tu agrado aprende terminos del juego que te van a ayudar a ser mas tactico con tu team
一个字：刺激！

Una vez más, el exitoso terapeuta Jorge Bucay echa mano de su talento como contador de historias para ahondar, mediante los recursos propios de la literatura, en asuntos que nos conciernen a todos. Este cuento expone verdades esenciales para vivir mejor. Narrado desde el punto de vista de una niña cuyos padres se han separado, el relato describe el encuentro entre este personaje y su abuela, una mujer de carácter difícil que, tras su aparente frialdad, oculta un secreto que será revelado poco a poco. El resultado es tan emotivo como iluminador.

El juego en general está muy bien, PERO, tienes sus contras como todos
PROS
- Divertido si juegas con amigos
- Agregan buenos asesinos relacionados con peliculas clásicas de slashers
- Ambientación decente
CONTRAS 
- Emparejamiento asqueroso, se van de las partidas o se suicidan (Aconsejable 100% jugar con amigos para ser un grupo completo)
- Hitboxes bastante cutres, te pueden llegar a pegar por wi-fi los asesinos
- A mucha gente le funciona mal el juego, ya que la optimización es mala
DBD é muito bom, o único problema são pessoas que jogam de killer, e não obedecem as regras, ficam camperando ou tunelando os sobreviventes.
Very fun game! Definitely more fun with friends. Very expansive roster of killers and survivors. 10/10 for sure!

Amikor megjelent a Halloween film új feldolgozása akkor vettem meg ezt a játékot a mellé rendelt chapterrel. Leölteni nem is töltöttem le mert nem volt időm nagyon de tudtam hogy kell ez nekem. Majd 1év elteltével ismét itt vagyok most értem ide. Letöltöttem. Ismét Halloween alkalmából, pedig amikor a Stranger Things rész kijött akkor is nagy volt a késztetés. 

Gondolom így már értitek a hypot. 

Őszi ködös téli ködös illetve havas meleg estéken főleg ha van kikkel játszani eszméletlen hangulatos tud lenni! Részemről amúgy is bírom a ködös dolgokat mapokat világokat. Jó látni hogy fejlődik, Mindig kerül bele új dolog. Sikoly filmet aki látta tudja milyen érzés az illetővel kaszabolni. Egyben rémisztő és hangulatos. A szíved megáll néha hogy csak NE! Ha sokallja valaki a teljes árat annak gyakran akciós illetve FREE is szokott lenni.

update:2021/12/15 Halloween alkalmából megvettem ehy ismerősömnek is a játékot úgy voltam vele ha nem akkor refoundolja. Most majd 200órát tekertünk bele azóta. Csatlakozott még több ismerősöm. Sajnos van aki EPIK storból mert ezt is elérte egy ingyenes időszak. Azt kell mondjam mind megszerettük! Roppant hangulatos szórakoztató és rémisztő/paráztató. Olyan is megszerette aki nem gondolta volna. Újabb chapter érkezett bele és már bejelentették a következőt is. A játék köré épült közösség eléggé változó. Vannak a halandók és a vérpistikék akik meta buildekkel bombázzák a népet mind gyilkos mind túlélő oldalon. Sajnos ez van hogy ront a játékélményen. Ilyen minden online játékban előfordul! Továbbra is azt tudom mondani hogy Ajánlot! 

Ajánlott!

The game really draws you in with interesting lore, an interesting cast of characters, and a satisfying game concept. But it stays at a concept. 

The core loop for players asks you to grind out blood web advancements through collection of blood points either by regular game play or completing daily/seasonal/archived challenges. However, the core gameplay is flawed in two big ways: Extremely poor balance and bizarre matchmaking.

The balance: There are items which, if one player chooses to bring them, will almost guarantee their victory. Survivors have keys which can allow them to open a randomly placed floor-hatch on the map for 5-30 seconds and will allow any and all survivors to escape, ending the match or making the remaining time significantly harder for any survivors left behind.
Moris are the killer version of this type of victory item. They can allow a killer to outright end a survivor after following the mori's conditions. The most infamous of these being the ebony mori, which requires one to hook a given survivor only once before allowing the killer to remove said survivor from the game. In the case of the ebony mori, a killer can treat all survivors in this manner.

But these are just the most egregious and painfully obvious offenders. The poor balancing can be felt across the board in the form of useless perks, over-powered perks, and killers which have a laughably difficult time achieving forward progress in a match.

The matchmaking: You start off at rank 20. As you play the game and accrue experience, your rank number will go down. Think of it as "placing" in a competition. One would think that the matchmaking system would match you with players of similar ranking to maintain even competition. Instead, you can commonly find that you've been playing against a rank 1 seasoned veteran of the game. Dead by Daylight is a game with a high skill ceiling, and the ability to migrate those previously mentioned unbalanced perks between characters. The experience as a new player entering the pool, going against these pros unprepared, is a grueling slog that leaves you feeling as though you had wasted your time rather than enjoyed the game you had payed for.

That's another thing: The price. Buying Dead by Daylight is buying into an ecosystem of DLC. The majority of survivors and killers in the game will be unavailable to you, along with all of the perks they bring. Given what we have covered so far, it doesn't seem like much of a leap in logic to guess that the poor balance may be by design rather than ignorance, to drive players towards purchasing their way towards a better chance at victory. Original characters created for the game can be bought with an in-game free currency after saving up. It would take a player a VERY long time to fully unlock their roster. Licensed characters can only be purchased with real money.

I bought this game on a steep Halloween sale. While I have enjoyed it for a while, I am running against these issues with greater frequency and it's becoming difficult to ignore. I would strongly advise you not to buy this outside of a sale, and even then I would implore you to take the time to investigate if any of the above issues have received any attention.

Edit: And now they're doing NFT. So disappointing.
